snippet: A top South American soccer official favored sanctions after members of an opposing team were sprayed with a caustic substance.
abstract: Boca Juniors may face sanctions after rival River Plate players are sprayed with caustic substance during Copa Libertadores playoff match.
lead_paragraph: A top South American soccer official favored sanctions after members of an opposing team were sprayed with a caustic substance.

headline.main: Boca Juniors Should Be Penalized, Soccer Official Says
